General.Name: Lily Textile Co Ltd
General.Description: Lily Textile Co., Ltd. engages in textile and logistics business activities in Taiwan. It engages in the spinning, weaving, processing, trading, bidding, and agency businesses of natural cotton, man-made fibers, and various chemical fibers. The company also constructs and sells buildings. In addition, it is involved in the warehousing, logitics, tally, processing, distribution, and information integration services, as well as e-commerce logistics activities. The company was founded in 1961 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.
